extra_virgin.source: Grok research: genuine oils exhibit natural random gradients in polyphenols/fatty acids

adulteration_indicators.description: Adulterants like sunflower/vegetable oil show low spectral entropy (<3.2) due to homogenization

virgin.source: Grok research: virgin grade shows slightly lower but still natural variance

pure.source: Grok research: refined/pure grades have lower natural variance

manuka.source: Grok research: authentic manuka honey has high pollen distribution randomness and crystallization variance

adulteration_indicators.description: Corn syrup adulteration lowers texture entropy below 3.5

wildflower.source: Grok research: wildflower honey shows high variance due to multi-source origin

clover.source: Grok research: clover honey has moderate variance from single-source origin

blue_crab.source: Grok research: genuine blue crab tissue shows natural biological variance in muscle structure

substitution_indicators.description: Foreign crab species have different tissue entropy signatures

wild_salmon.source: Grok research: wild salmon tissue shows high natural variance vs farmed

substitution_indicators.description: Farmed salmon shows lower tissue entropy due to controlled diet

cod.source: Grok research: cod tissue entropy signature distinguishes from cheaper substitutes

tuna.source: Grok research: tuna tissue shows species-specific entropy patterns

bordeaux.source: Grok research: genuine Bordeaux shows complex chemical variance

saffron.source: Grok research: genuine saffron has high spectral variance, adulterants show low entropy

meta.source: Grok Research - Food fraud detection via entropy analysis
